books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The 25th book in the Carpathian series follows the story of Skyler Daratrazanoff and Dimitri Tirunul begun in “Dark Lycan.”
books.name: DARK WOLF

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The Boston detective D. D. Warren, seriously injured at a crime scene, is treated by a pain therapist whose father was a serial killer.
books.name: FEAR NOTHING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: In the 28th Stone Barrington novel, the New York lawyer takes on a complicated new client.
books.name: STANDUP GUY

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Donovan Kelly, part of an elite, family-run task force, tries to protect a beautiful stranger whose dark past is closing in on her.
books.name: AFTER THE STORM

books.author: by Jayne Ann Krentz
books.description: When Lucy Sheridan returns to the California town of Summer River after her aunt’s death, she discovers that the events of her last visit there were more complicated than she knew.
books.name: RIVER ROAD

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Mark Greaney
books.description: President Jack Ryan and his son, a covert intelligence expert, try to counter a Russian threat in Clancy’s last novel before his death.
books.name: COMMAND AUTHORITY

books.author: by Jay Crownover
books.description: Cora Lewis is searching for a quiet man, but instead she falls in love with Rome Archer, whose final tour of duty has shaken him; a Marked Men novel.
books.name: ROME

books.author: by Graeme Simsion
books.description: A man with Asperger's syndrome becomes involved with an unconventional woman.
books.name: THE ROSIE PROJECT

books.author: by J. Kenner
books.description: A new series of erotic novels; this one features the sexy Evan Black.
books.name: WANTED

books.author: by Bernard Cornwell
books.description: The fate of the English nation is at stake as the Saxon kingdom battles the Danes in the early 10th century.
books.name: THE PAGAN LORD
